titles.title: To add suicide prevention resources to school identification cards.
To add suicide prevention resources to school identification cards.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

term.name: Emergency medical services and trauma care

bill.summary:
This bill amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require an institution that creates and distributes student-identification cards to include on such cards phone contact information for the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline, the Crisis Text Line, and either the campus mental-health program or the local nonemergency line.
An institution that does not create and distribute such cards shall publish such information on its website.
